title: My friend Bugsplats when he tries connecting to games.
body: So my friend and I just wanted to have a chill game of league. We all choose our champions and load up to summoners rift but my friend can't connect. He's a beginner and he says he's getting a bug splat. I dont know how to fix it because when i get bug splats its in the middle of the game. Anything would help. Thanks ! :)

replies.body: Try running through some of the solutions on the [Bug Splat page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes).

Elduris with the assist!

Those bug splats can mean a number of different things, but mostly they're caused by some kind of software issue like an outdated driver. Check out this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and you should be on your way, but hit me back if you still need help ^_^!
Same issue as your friend. Game crashed right after champ select, before loading screen appears. If you find a solution, pls let me know
